ALL NEW : cPanel SEO Optimized Web Hosting Packages with Unlimited SSD Raid-10 Disk Space and Unlimited Un-Metered GigE Bandwidth

TurnKey Internet, Inc provides dedicated servers, colocation, web hosting, cloud, and virtual servers from it's company-owned and operated green datacenter. Since 1999, TurnKey Internet, Inc. has built a reputation of outstanding personalized service, reliability, and value. Owning our own datacenter lets our on-site 5-star rated staff answer your questions quickly and provide complete solutions direct from our expert team located right in the same building as your servers. We are experts in the Cloud Hosting and Datacenter space with a true dedication to your online success every step of the way.

Our company-owned enterprise grade web hosting servers exclusively use SSD disk systems in high performance and redundant RAID-10 configuration - each web hosting server has at least 24+ CPU cores and 32 GB of ram, and dedicated Gigabit network speeds - for blazing fast performance to host your web sites and applications such as Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal, and much more!

FREE Website & Server Migrations : TurnKey Internet makes migrating to our cloud and web hosting services easier than ever by handling all the migration work for your website(s) and servers including all email, databases, websites, and applications. More Information


View all cPanel SEO Optimized Web Hosting Packages Additional 10% Off For Life when you pre-pay Annually!


TurnKey's Ultra Fast SEO Optimized cPanel web Hosting combines lightning fast cPanel web servers with a vast array of unique non-shared dedicated C-Class IP's that maximize your advantage for the Google SEO ranking algorithm.

Has your website portfolio been crippled by Google's Panda updates? Have you thrown in the towel with your website network being slow to load and your old hosting provider always offline? Look no further – our SEO optimized web hosting packages can help get your web site portfolio back into an Olympic sized SEO Ranking victory again!

The key to your SEO ranking success is hosting your unique and quality SEO content over a vast array of dedicated, non-shared, unique C-Class IP's coupled with the SEO ranking algorithm benefits of protecting your sites with trusted, signed HTTPS/SSL certificates as confirmed by Google in 2014.

Over the past few months we have been running tests taking into account whether sites use secure, encrypted connections as a signal in our search ranking algorithms. We've seen positive results, so we're starting to use HTTPS as a ranking signal because we’d like to encourage all website owners to switch from HTTP to HTTPS to keep everyone safe on the web.
Click to expand...

Unique C-Class IP's let you maximize the benefit of Google's new SEO rankings by utilizing the most secure and fastest responding HTTPS/SSL certificates for your web sites.

Our web hosting servers are customized and optimized for web professionals who know the best way to launch their portfolio of websites to the top of search engines like Bing, Yahoo, and Google. Our SEO hosting packages offer best-in-class features, speed, and options specific to achieving top SEO rankings. Our servers offer ultra-fast page loads from their Dual Hexa core CPU's and blazing-fast RAID 10 disk systems. The server software is customized to provide the ultimate security for your websites with our custom server monitoring, mod security web security rules, and intrusion detection systems, all to make sure your site is not hosted next to some hijacked WordPress blog site! Global accelerated content delivery through CloudFlare launches page load speeds to the highest levels possible. Our brand new Attracta built in premium SEO tools give you ready-to-go access to SEO tools like sitemap creation and search engine submission tools. Combined with the cPanel/WHM interface and up to 50 unique non-shared dedicated class-C IP’s, you can now host your entire portfolio of websites through one easy to use control panel. Best yet, the MySQL database, apache web server, and PHP systems are all optimized for the most popular WordPress, Drupal, and Joomla-based content systems. This is The Ultimate SEO Optimized cPanel Web Hosting package.
